content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL
content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate 
stand in recess subject to the call of the Chair.

content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
content.text:
The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, the Senate stands in recess 
subject to the call of the Chair.
  Thereupon, the Senate, at 4:00 p.m., recessed subject to the call of 
the Chair and reassembled at 4:04 p.m., when called to order by the 
Chief Justice.

doc_title: RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR
title: RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR
